src:
Jokowi Singgung Paloh soal Temui Presiden PKS, PDIP: Itu Gocekan Khas
06 Nov 2019, 22:38 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menyebut wajah Ketum NasDem Surya Paloh terlihat lebih cerah usai bertemu Presiden PKS Sohibul Iman. Menurut PDIP, ucapan itu bukan sindiran, melainkan gocekan khas dari Jokowi.
"Saya maknai bukan sebagai sindiran, tapi itu gocekan khas ala Pak Jokowi," kata Sekjen PDIP Hasto Kristiyanto di Hotel Sultan, kawasan Senayan, Jakarta Pusat, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Dia menilai ucapan Jokowi saat memberi sambutan dalam acara HUT ke-55 Partai Golkar itu sebagai hal biasa. Menurutnya, Jokowi bicara seperti memang untuk memancing tawa.
"Ya itu biasa, supaya suasananya akrab dan kita lihat semuanya tertawa. Pak JK (Jusuf Kalla) juga kelihatan happy, semuanya kelihatan happy, ini ulang tahun nggak ada sindir-sindiran," ujar Hasto.
Hasto juga menilai ucapan Jokowi bukan peringatan dari koalisi untuk NasDem. Hasto menilai pertemuan NasDem dengan PKS adalah dialog politik.
"Tidak, kan Pak Surya Paloh menyatakan apa yang dilakukan adalah bagian dari dialog," ujarnya.
Sebelumnya, Jokowi menyapa Paloh di acara HUT Golkar. Jokowi menyebut Paloh terlihat segar setelah bertemu dengan Sohibul Iman beberapa waktu lalu.
"Bapak Surya Paloh yang kalau kita lihat malam hari ini lebih cerah dari biasanya. Sehabis pertemuan beliau dengan Pak Sohibul Iman di PKS. Wajahnya cerah setelah berangkulan dengan Pak Sohibul," kata Jokowi di Hotel Sultan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11).

(rfs/haf)
text:
Jokowi Touches Paloh about Meeting with PKS President, PDIP: That's a Typical Joke
Nov 6, 2019, 22:38 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) said the face of Ketum NasDem Surya Paloh looks brighter after meeting PKS President Sohibul Iman. According to PDIP, the statement was not a satire, but rather a distinctive joke from Jokowi.
"I mean it is not as a satire, but it is a typical joke ala Pak Jokowi," said PDIP Secretary General Hasto Kristiyanto at the Sultan Hotel, Senayan area, Central Jakarta, Wednesday (6/11/2019).
He considered Jokowi's speech when giving a speech at the Golkar Party's 55th birthday as normal. According to him, Jokowi spoke as if to provoke laughter.
"Yes, it's normal, so the atmosphere is familiar and we see everyone laughing. Mr. JK (Jusuf Kalla) also looks happy, everything looks happy, this is a birthday there are no innuendos," Hasto said.
Hasto also considered Jokowi's words were not a warning from the coalition for NasDem. Hasto considered NasDem's meeting with PKS to be a political dialogue.
"No, didn't Pak Surya Paloh say what was done was part of the dialogue," he said.
Previously, Jokowi greeted Paloh at the Golkar Anniversary event. Jokowi said Paloh looked fresh after meeting with Sohibul Iman some time ago.
"Mr. Surya Paloh who if we see tonight is brighter than usual. After his meeting with Mr. Sohibul Iman at PKS. His face was bright after embracing with Mr. Sohibul," Jokowi said at the Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Wednesday (6/11).

(rfs / haf)
